SEARCH
Package Models

Class Patient

java.lang.Object
Models.User
Models.Patient
public class Patient extends User
The Patient class models a patient in the hospital system. It includes functionality for managing personal information, scheduling appointments, viewing medical records, and interacting with other system components like appointment and medical record management.

  • Constructor Details

    • Patient

      public Patient(String hospitalID, String password, String role, String name, LocalDate birthDate, String gender, String phoneNum, String email, String bloodType)
      Constructs a new Patient object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The hospital ID of the patient.
      password - The password for the patient's account.
      role - The role of the patient (e.g., "Patient").
      name - The name of the patient.
      birthDate - The birth date of the patient.
      gender - The gender of the patient.
      phoneNum - The phone number of the patient.
      email - The email address of the patient.
      bloodType - The blood type of the patient.

    • Patient

      public Patient(String hospitalID, String name, LocalDate birthDate, String gender, String phoneNum, String email, String bloodType)
      Constructs a new Patient object with basic details (without password).
      Parameters:
      hospitalID - The hospital ID of the patient.
      name - The name of the patient.
      birthDate - The birth date of the patient.
      gender - The gender of the patient.
      phoneNum - The phone number of the patient.
      email - The email address of the patient.
      bloodType - The blood type of the patient.

  • Method Details

    • viewMedicalRecord

      public boolean viewMedicalRecord()
      Views the medical record for this patient.
      Returns:
      true if the medical record is successfully viewed, otherwise false.

    • viewAvailableAppointmentSlots

      public List<TimeSlot> viewAvailableAppointmentSlots()

      Returns:

    • scheduleAppointment

      public boolean scheduleAppointment(String doctorID, String timeSlotID, Service service)
      Schedules an appointment for the patient.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor.
      timeslotID - The ID of the time slot.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment is successfully scheduled, otherwise false.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public boolean rescheduleAppointment(String oldAppointmentID, String newTimeSlotID)
      Reschedules an existing appointment for the patient.
      Parameters:
      oldAppointmentID - The ID of the current appointment.
      newTimeSlotID - The ID of the new time slot.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment is successfully rescheduled, otherwise false.

    • cancelAppointment

      public boolean cancelAppointment(String appointmentID)

      Returns:
      true if the appointment is successfully canceled, otherwise false.

    • getScheduledAppointments

      Views the scheduled appointments for this patient.
      Returns:
